product_name: White Sierra South Shore Hooded Softshell - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: A weatherproof soft-shell jacket with a warm fleece lining and adjustable hood, the White Sierra South Shore jacket for men will fend off showers so you can continue to enjoy your time outside. Waterproof, breathable soft-shell fabric offers excellent comfort for dynamic activity. Zippered hand pockets; zippered upper arm pocket; adjustable drawcord hem and cuffs. Special buy.
